body_text: If I submit an approval request and then view the request history, I can still see the UI for commenting and approving/rejecting the request even though it's not possible for me to do those actions. It'd probably be good for us to hide everything except the close button when viewing your own approval request (unless PEER_APPROVAL_ENFORCED is false, of course).

title: Hide approval request buttons if viewing your own approval request
body: If I submit an approval request and then view the request history, I can still see the UI for commenting and approving/rejecting the request even though it's not possible for me to do those actions. It'd probably be good for us to hide everything except the close button when viewing your own approval request (unless `PEER_APPROVAL_ENFORCED` is false, of course).
